visual.name: HierarchicalFilterByxViz
visual.description: Displays multiple category values in a tree structure

dataRoles.name: tmeasure
dataRoles.description: Assign data to be shown in tooltip

key.description: Unlock additional capabilities with your license key. To purchase a license, visit our website http://xviz.com

fontfamily.description: Applied to all the text in the visual

enumeration.value: Lucida Grande, Lucida Sans Unicode, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

hideBlank.description:
Hide/Show nodes with empty value or category.
Note: In multi measure scenario, Hide values works based on the first measure.

level.description: The default level to which the tree will expand by default

removeSingleChildren.description: When you have a tree structure ending X-A-B-C-N where A, B, C and N are single children, use one of the following options to customize this portion of the tree.

filterIconColor.description: To set the fill color for the filter icon.

interaction.description: Choose the formatting for specific interactive states

unselectedfilterIconColor.description: To set the background color for the filter icon.

nodeCustomization.description: Choose the node type to customize

parentNodeColor.description: Change the color of the parent node text

parentNodeFontSize.description: Change the font size of the parent node text

parentNodeStyleFilter.description: Change the font style of the parent node text

rootNodeColor.description: Change the color of the top node text

rootNodeFontSize.description: Change the font size of the top node text

rootNodeStyle.description: Change the font style of the top node text

dlNoOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

enableTooltip.description: Enable Custom Number Formatting For Tooltip

formatNegativeValues.description: Select the number format for  Negative values.

formatPositiveValues.description: Select the number format for  Positive values.

semanticFormatting.description: Colors for underlying Data Format Types

tooltipNoOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

color2.description: When % Variance is above Threshold 2 (if defined)

color3.description: When % Variance is above Threshold 1 but below Threshold 2 (if defined)
